title: As Death Count Rises, Health Officials Work To Stem Ebola's Spread
teaser: The World Health Organization is reporting that the Ebola virus has yet to be contained in West Africa. It's one of the largest Ebola outbreaks in decades.
contentencoded:
The World Health Organization is reporting that the Ebola virus has yet to be contained in West Africa. It's one of the largest Ebola outbreaks in decades â€” with over 500 cases, some 330 of which ended in death.
